info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 11:13AM CDT until April 13 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Little River County in southwestern Arkansas... Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Sevier County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Howard County in southwestern Arkansas... East central Bowie County in northeastern Texas... * Until noon CDT. * At 1113 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ogden, or 7 miles north of Texarkana, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Hope, Ashdown, Mineral Springs, Red Lick, Emmet, Wilton, Blevins, Perrytown, Tollette, Fulton, Washington, Ogden, Saratoga, Richmond, Leary, McCaskill, Ozan, McNab and Oakhaven. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for southwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
